intro: Capsicum rabenii, commonly known as the Rabenii chili, is a species of Capsicum native to South America. It is a herbaceous plant that typically grows to a height of about 30–60 cm. The plant produces small, yellow or orange fruits that are generally not used for culinary purposes. Its leaves are oval and have a slightly hairy texture. Botanically, it is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and its ability to thrive in tropical and subtropical climates.
